thread.title: Some 4,500 DWP customers without power in West LA, high heat blamed
thread.title_full: Some 4,500 DWP customers without power in West LA, high heat blamed - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: Some 4,500 DWP customers without power in West LA, high heat blamed
text: An outage left about 4,500 Department of Water and Power customers in West Los Angeles without electricity Friday night. The outage was reported at 8:10 p.m., DWP spokeswoman Carol Tucker said. An estimated time of restoration was not immediately available, she said. The cause of the outage was blamed on high demand amid hot temperatures, Tucker said. Advertisement
